Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ مَفْرُوضٌ
enWisdom: Gratitude is obligatory

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ مَغْنَمٌ
enWisdom: Gratitude is advantageous

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ زِينَةٌ لِلنَّعْمَاءِ [زَيْنُ النَّعْمَاءِ]
enWisdom: Gratitude is an embellishment for blessing[s]

Wisdom: الْكَرِيمُ يَشْكُرُ الْقَلِيلَ وَاللَّئِيمُ يُكَفِّرُ الْجَزِيلَ
enWisdom: The noble-minded person shows gratitude for little whereas the wicked one is ungrateful for much

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ تَرْجُمَانُ النِّيَّةِ وَلِسَانُ الطَّوِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Gratitude is the interpreter of intention and the tongue of [one’s inner] conscience

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ مَأْخُوذٌ عَلَى أَهْلِ النِّعَمِ
enWisdom: Gratitude is obligatory upon the people of blessings

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ أَحَدُ الْجَزَاءَيْنِ
enWisdom: Gratitude is one of the two rewards

Wisdom: الشُّكْرُ أَعْظَمُ قَدْراً مِنَ الْمَعْرُوفِ لِأَنَّ الشُّكْرَ يَبْقَى وَالْمَعْرُوفُ يَفْنَى
enWisdom: Gratitude has greater value than a good action because the gratitude lasts while the good action comes to an end

Wisdom: اشْتَغِلْ بِشُكْرِ النِّعْمَةِ عَنِ التَّطَرُّبِ بِهَا
enWisdom: Occupy yourself in being grateful for the blessing rather than being delighted by it

Wisdom: أَحْسِنُوا جِوَارَ نِعَمِ الدِّينِ وَالدُّنْيَا بِالشُّكْرِ لِمَنْ دَلَّ [دَلَّكُمْ‏] عَلَيْهَا
enWisdom: Be good neighbours to the blessings of religion and this world by showing gratitude to the one who guides you to them

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ السُّمْعَةِ شُكْرٌ يُنْشَرُ
enWisdom: The best thing that spoken loudly [in order that others may hear] is the gratitude that is publicized

Wisdom: أَحَبُّ النَّاسِ إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ الْعَامِلُ فِيمَا أَنْعَمَ بِهِ عَلَيْهِ بِالشُّكْرِ وَأَبْغَضُهُمْ إِلَيْهِ الْعَامِلُ فِي نِعَمِهِ بِكُفْرِهَا
enWisdom: The most beloved of people to Allah, the Glorified, is the one who deals gratefully with the blessings that have been bestowed upon him and the most hated of them to Him is the one who deals ungratefully with His blessings

Wisdom: إِنْ آتَاكُمُ اللَّهُ بِنِعْمَةٍ فَاشْكُرُوا
enWisdom: If Allah bestows you with a blessing then show gratitude

Wisdom: إِذَا أُعْطِيتَ فَاشْكُرْ
enWisdom: When you are given, show gratitude

Wisdom: إِذَا أَنْعَمْتَ بِالنِّعْمَةِ فَقَدْ قَضَيْتَ شُكْرَهَا
enWisdom: When you do good to others with a blessing [that you have been bestowed with], then you have shown gratitude for it

Wisdom: إِذَا نَزَلَتْ بِكَ النِّعْمَةُ فَاجْعَلْ قِرَاهَا الشُّكْرَ
enWisdom: When a blessing comes down to you then receive it with gratitude

Wisdom: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ إِذَا أُعْطِيَ شَكَرَ وَإِذَا ابْتُلِيَ صَبَرَ وَإِذَا ظُلِمَ غَفَرَ
enWisdom: The best person is one who shows gratitude when he is given, remains patient when he is tested [with tribulations], and forgives when he is wronged

Wisdom: شَكَرْتَ الْوَاهِبَ وَبُورِكَ لَكَ فِي الْمَوْهُوبِ وَبَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ وَرُزِقْتَ بِرَّهُ
enWisdom: He (‘a) said to a man whom he was congratulating for the birth of his son: You have occasion to be grateful to Allah, the Giver, and be blessed in the gift that you have been bestowed withMay he come of age and may you be blessed with his devotion

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالشُّكْرِ فِي السَّرَّاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ
enWisdom: You must give thanks [both] in ease and adversity

Wisdom: عَقْلُ الْمَرْءِ نِظَامُهُ وَأَدَبُهُ قَوَامُهُ وَصِدْقُهُ إِمَامُهُ وَشُكْرُهُ تَمَامُهُ
enWisdom: The intellect of a person is his order, his etiquette is his foundation, his honesty is his leader and his gratitude is his perfection

Wisdom: فِي الرَّخَاءِ تَكُونُ فَضِيلَةُ الشُّكْرِ
enWisdom: The excellence of gratitude is in times of ease

Wisdom: فِي كُلِّ بِرٍّ شُكْرٌ
enWisdom: In every righteous act there is gratitude

Wisdom: قَدْ أَوْجَبَ الدَّهْرُ شُكْرَهُ عَلَى مَنْ بَلَغَ سُؤْلَهُ
enWisdom: Time has indeed made its gratitude incumbent on the one who attains what he seeks

Wisdom: كُنْ فِي السَّرَّاءِ عَبْداً شَكُوراً وَفِي الضَّرَّاءِ عَبْداً صَبُوراً
enWisdom: Be a thankful servant in times of ease and a patient servant in times of adversity

Wisdom: مَنْ أُنْعِمَ عَلَيْهِ فَشَكَرَ كَمَنِ ابْتُلِيَ فَصَبَرَ
enWisdom: One who is bestowed with a blessing and gives thanks for it is like the one who is tried with difficulties and bears them patiently

Wisdom: مَنْ شَكَرَ الْمَعْرُوفَ فَقَدْ قَضَى حَقَّهُ
enWisdom: One who shows gratitude for [and act of] kindness has indeed fulfilled its right

Wisdom: مَنْ قَابَلَ الْإِحْسَانَ بِأَفْضَلَ مِنْهُ فَقَدْ جَازَاهُ
enWisdom: One who reciprocates a good turn with a better one has [appropriately] repaid it

Wisdom: مَنْ بَذَلَ لَكَ جُهْدَ عِنَايَتِهِ فَابْذُلْ لَهُ جُهْدَ شُكْرِكَ
enWisdom: Whoever makes the effort to show concern for you, then make the effort to show him your gratitude?

Wisdom: مَنْ أُوتِيَ [أولي‏] نِعْمَةً فَقَدِ اسْتَعْبَدَ بِهَا حَتَّى يُعْتِقَهُ الْقِيَامُ بِشُكْرِهَا
enWisdom: One who is granted a blessing has indeed been enslaved by it until he is freed by his show of gratitude for it

Wisdom: مَنْ شَكَرَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ وَجَبَ عَلَيْهِ شُكْرٌ ثَانٍ إِذْ [إِذَا] وَفَّقَهُ لِشُكْرِهِ وَهُوَ شُكْرُ الشُّكْرِ
enWisdom: One who thanks Allah, the Glorified, has to give thanks twice as it was He who enabled him to give thanks [in the first place] and that is the gratitude for being thankful

Wisdom: نِعَمُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَكْثَرُ مِنْ أَنْ تُشْكَرَ إِلَّا مَا أَعَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَذُنُوبُ ابْنِ آدَمَ أَكْثَرُ مِنْ أَنْ تُغْفَرَ إِلَّا مَا عَفَا اللَّهُ عَنْهُ
enWisdom: The blessings of Allah, the Most High, are greater than can be appreciated, except with the help of Allah, and the sins of mankind are greater than can be forgiven, except what Allah pardons [out of His mercy]

Wisdom: لَا تَنْسَوْا عِنْدَ النِّعْمَةِ شُكْرَكُمْ
enWisdom: Do not forget to show your gratitude when you receive blessings
